works.complaint:
Dear Sir/Madam,
This review is incorrect. It is a well known documented fact that mice and
 
rats do not co-habitat. We have cleaners who work extremely hard at
keeping  
all rooms cleaned. We also have a contract with a  well known
linen/laundry  
company, and spend many thousands of pounds a year, we can provide
invoices  
if required. We have 4 communal showers and 14 en-suites, so the statement
 
regarding showers is incorrect. With regard to the locks not working it
may  
be the case that the customer could not work the lock properly although we
 
explain how to work them when the customers arrive we have an extensive  
maintenance regime and all locks work properly. As to the comment
regarding  
the area I can only say that I have worked in the area for 23 years and  
have never felt threatened in any way. We have staff on site 24hrs a day  

and CCTV cameras on site also.
I respectfully request that this inaccurate and malicious review be
removed.
Yours sincerely
Paul Fosh
